item.title: EP 685 - Can The Dead See The Future?
item.itunes:title: Can The Dead See The Future?
item.description:
Today we meet a Civil War ghost with a thirst for blood, and then we meet a mom who died . . . and came back!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

https://www.drmaryneal.com/

https://www.oprah.com/own-indeepshift/what-dr-mary-neal-saw-when-she-died-video#ixzz6mEajG9k4

Mary Neal Says She Knew About Her Son’s Death Years Before It Happened (VIDEO)

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
